description:
This is a market on a number of times the #1 song will be streamed globally by Spotify on the week ending November 18, 2021. 

The resolution source for this market will be Spotify Charts (https://spotifycharts.com/), which ranks most popular songs streamed by Spotify, filtered by "Global", "Weekly", and "November 18."

This market will resolve to "Yes" if at least one song will record 50,000,000 or more global weekly streams, for the week ending on November 18th. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be checked on November 19th, 8:00 PM ET. If data isn't available by November 25, 8:00 PM ET, the market will resolve 50/50. 


-----------------
Note, the stream count you see in charts might look different to the app and Spotify for Artists.

Spotify generates chart stream numbers using a special formula that protects the integrity of charts, and makes sure all voices of our users are reflected. It means not every stream on Spotify is eligible for Charts. Some songs may have fewer chart-eligible streams than others, depending on streaming behavior.

events.title: Will the top song on Spotify Charts hit 50M global streams for the week ending on November 18?

question: Will the top song on Spotify Charts hit 50M global streams for the week ending on November 18?
